remarks: Closure of meet of elements in the domain.  (Contributed by NM, 12-Sep-2018.)
statement:
meetcl.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
meetcl.m $e |- ./\ = ( meet ` K ) $.
meetcl.k $e |- ( ph -> K e. V ) $.
meetcl.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. B ) $.
meetcl.y $e |- ( ph -> Y e. B ) $.
meetcl.e $e |- ( ph -> <. X , Y >. e. dom ./\ ) $.
meetcl $p |- ( ph -> ( X ./\ Y ) e. B ) $.
